Package: org.gradle.platform.base

[Java] Interface BinarySpec

    • org.gradle.api.Buildable
    • All Superinterfaces:
      Buildable

      Represents a binary artifact that is the result of building a project component.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          String getDisplayName()
          Returns a human-consumable display name for this binary.
          DomainObjectSet<LanguageSourceSet> getSource()
          The source sets used to compile this binary.
          BinaryTasksCollection getTasks()
          The set of tasks associated with this binary.
          boolean isBuildable()
          Can this binary be built in the current environment?
          void source(Object source)
          Adds one or more LanguageSourceSets that are used to compile this binary.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          interface BuildableModelElement builtBy, getBuildTask, setBuildTask, hasBuildDependencies, getBuildDependencies
          interface Named getName

      • Method Detail

        • public String getDisplayName()

          Returns a human-consumable display name for this binary.

        • public DomainObjectSet<LanguageSourceSet> getSource()

          The source sets used to compile this binary.

        • public BinaryTasksCollection getTasks()

          The set of tasks associated with this binary.

        • public boolean isBuildable()

          Can this binary be built in the current environment?

        • public void source(Object source)

          Adds one or more LanguageSourceSets that are used to compile this binary.

          This method accepts the following types:

          • A FunctionalSourceSet
          • A LanguageSourceSet
          • A Collection of LanguageSourceSets
